phrs.translation: 繁重的, 繁冗, 烦累的, 累赘的
过于沉重的负担, 不合理的负担
麻烦的, 笨重的, 粗笨的
累赘的, 麻烦的, 拖累的

sentences.sentence: As the report authors point out, even near-misses might lead to the "creation of a burdensome regulatory framework and affect the future disposition of science Cube Sats".
sentences.translation: 正如报告的作者所指出的，即使是差之毫末也可能导致“产生一个繁重的监管框架，并影响科学立方体卫星的未来部署”。

sentences.sentence: In many cases, it would not be overly burdensome for authorities to obtain a warrant to search through phone contents.
sentences.translation: 在许多情况下，当局获得搜查电话内容的授权令并不太麻烦。
